description:
Two people have been killed in a house explosion reportedly caused when a heat pump borehole released methane gas at a nearby property.

The post Two People Killed in House Explosion After Heat Pump Borehole Releases Methane Gas appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Two People Killed in House Explosion After Heat Pump Borehole Releases Methane Gas

description:
Dr Andrew Bamji, a retired Consultant Rheumatologist and former President of the British Society for Rheumatology, reviews Norman Fenton and Martin Neil's Fighting Goliath, saying what he thinks they get right and wrong.

The post Fighting Goliath: What Norman Fenton and Martin Neil Get Right – and Wrong appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Fighting Goliath: What Norman Fenton and Martin Neil Get Right – and Wrong

description:
Germany’s Government has collapsed over its refusal to budge on Net Zero after Chancellor Olaf Scholz fired his Finance Minister on Wednesday evening.

The post German Government Collapses Over Refusal to Budge on Net Zero appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German Government Collapses Over Refusal to Budge on Net Zero

description:
A fascist has been elected 47th President of the USA. Or so says the Guardian, which assembled a bunch of Left-wing academics to throw around lazy student insults. It just makes them look dumb, says Prof James Alexander.

The post Fascism for Dummies appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Fascism for Dummies

description:
Fears are growing for the long-term future of the satellite temperature record that shines a light on the corrupted and "adjusted" data favoured by alarmists as Government funding looks set to dry up, says Chris Morrison.

The post Vital Satellite Temperature Record That Shines Light on Corrupted and “Adjusted” Data Could be Lost Due to Lack of Funding appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Vital Satellite Temperature Record That Shines Light on Corrupted and “Adjusted” Data Could be Lost Due to Lack of Funding

description:

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.
